Key Match Events: Suryakumar Yadav was run out by Kyle Mayers with a direct hit.
Shubman Gill was caught by Shimron Hetmyer off Alzarri Joseph's bowling.
Ishan Kishan hit a six off Akeal Hosein's bowling.
West Indies beat India by 2 wickets.
Pre-Game Insights: Hardik Pandya, the captain of India, decided to bat first after winning the toss.
Hardik Pandya mentioned that they have a forced change with Kuldeep Yadav injuring himself in the nets and Ravi Bishnoi comes in to replace him.
Rovman Powell, the captain of West Indies, mentioned that they did not lose wickets in cluster and bowled as a unit as well.
Rovman Powell mentioned that they are sticking to the same side.
